title: Tool specification schema file by NUKE

___baseClass.description: The base class to inherit from.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. DataClass is marked as obsolete when specified.

___type.description: Type of the property. I.e., bool, int, string, List<int>, Dictionary<string, object>, Lookup<string, int.>

___itemFormat.description: Item formatting for dictionaries. '{key}' and '{value}' are replaced accordingly.

___quoteMultiple.description: Specifies if list items should be double quoted.

___default.description: Default value that will be used if no value is given.

___secret.description: Specifies that the value is secret and should be hidden in output.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. Property is marked as obsolete when specified.

___format.description: Argument formatting for the property. '{value}' is replaced by the value of the property.

___separator.description: Separator used for items of collection types.

___createOverload.description: Specifies that an overload for the property should be created.

___json.description: Name used when serializing to JSON.

___omitDataClass.description: Omits generation of the data class.

___extensionMethods.description: Enables generation of extension methods for modification.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. Enumeration is marked as obsolete when specified.

___officialUrl.description: Url of the task. If not specified, the tool url will be used.

___omitCommonProperties.description: Skips appending of common task properties.

___commonPropertySets.description: Appends the properties of the named property sets.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. Task is marked as obsolete when specified.

___help.description: Help or introduction text to for the tool. Supports 'a-href', 'c', 'em', 'b', 'ul', 'li' and 'para' tags for better formatting.

___tasks.description: Help or introduction text to for the tool. Can contain HTML tags for better formatting.

___officialUrl.description: Url of the task. If not specified, the tool url will be used.

___omitCommonProperties.description: Skips appending of common task properties.

___commonPropertySets.description: Appends the properties of the named property sets.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. Task is marked as obsolete when specified.

___help.description: Help or introduction text to for the tool. Supports 'a-href', 'c', 'em', 'b', 'ul', 'li' and 'para' tags for better formatting.

___definiteArgument.description: Argument that will always be printed independently of any set property.

___pathExecutable.description: Exact name of the executable that can be found via 'where' or 'which'.

___baseClass.description: The base class to inherit from.

___deprecationMessage.description: Obsolete message. DataClass is marked as obsolete when specified.

___omitDataClass.description: Omits generation of the data class.

___extensionMethods.description: Enables generation of extension methods for modification.

___packageExecutable.description: Exact name of the main executable found in the './tools' folder. Case-sensitive.

___customExecutable.description: Defines that locating the executable is implemented customly.

____metadata.description: Can be used to store additional information about the tool.

___references.description: Contains all references on which this definition is based on. Allows checking for updates.
